questions.questionText: What components make up the total gas fees in an IOTA transaction?
What happens to storage fees when data is deleted in an IOTA transaction?

answerOptions.answerText: The storage fee is partially rebated.
The storage fee is fully rebated.
The storage fee increases with every deletion.
There is no rebate for storage fees

questions.questionText: Why does IOTA use a bucketing approach for computation units?

answerOptions.answerText: To discourage validators from optimizing smart contracts.
To simplify gas cost calculations and avoid marginal gas cost optimizations.
To reduce the computational load on validators.
To increase the complexity of transactions.
